robot_capabilities.duneRunner: A small rover robot. Equipped with camera and lidar. Can move in both sand and water. Has a winch for pulling. It can pull any objets.
robot_capabilities.aquaRover: A small rover robot. Equipped with camera and lidar. Can move in both sand and water. Has a winch for pulling. It can pull any objets.
robot_capabilities.shoreHauler: A small rover robot. Equipped with camera and lidar. Can move in both sand and water. Has a winch for pulling. It can pull any objets.

robot_morphology.duneRunner: Payload: ~75 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 600 mm
robot_morphology.aquaRover: Payload: ~75 kg, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 600 mm
robot_morphology.shoreHauler: Payload: ~75 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 600 mm
